item.title: One of the leading PSL organizers that was targeted, charged,...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

One of the leading PSL organizers that was targeted, charged, arrested, and jailed, Lillian, is speaking on this panel of labor leaders today. Tune in!

This broad labor coalition, the Committee to Stop Police Terrorism & To End Systemic Racism, has issued a call to organize nationally against the attacks on protestors like those in Denver, and to prepare for an independent national labor mobilization in this struggle. Working people cannot wait to organize and prepare for this coming battle!

SAT, OCT 3

National Panel: Fight Against Racism and Fascism; Fight for Workers' Rights and Democracy

Online EventCauses ¬∑ 142 people

item.title: Despite the endless barrage of advertisements from the Biden...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Despite the endless barrage of advertisements from the Biden campaign opportunistically making use of footage from this summer‚Äôs demonstrations, or the assurances of Democratic Party-aligned activist organizations, Biden himself made it crystal clear: He‚Äôs on the side of the police.

Democratic presidential contender Joe Biden went out of his way in last night‚Äôs debate to distance himself from the historic mass movement against racism and police violence that has emerged in recent months. Despite the endless barrage of advertisements from the Biden campaign... #JoeBiden

liberationnews.org

Biden embraces cops in first presidential debate

Party for Socialism and Liberation - DenverDave Russell is with James Rotten and 17 others.

‚ÄúOur determination is so much greater than our fear. Our solidarity is so much greater than the repression. I have never felt more confident that we have what i...t takes to go the distance. WE WILL WIN!‚Äù - Lillian, recently released political prisoner who spent eight days in jail, without the opportunity to post bond.

The only thing she is guilty of is relentlessly pursuing justice for Elijah McClain.

#DroptheCharges

item.title: Video has emerged of Shataean Kelly, a Black woman, being...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Video has emerged of Shataean Kelly, a Black woman, being hogtied and brutalized by former APD Officer Levi Huffine. She is heard saying she can‚Äôt breathe, just like Elijah McClain, George Floyd, Eric Garner and so many others. APD Chief Vanessa Wilson has claimed that had Shataean died in the patrol car Officer Huffine would be in jail. So there's only a crime if someone dies? How can we trust the same Chief Wilson who refuses to fire the killer cops who murdered Elijah McClain and 17th District Attorney Dave Young who refuses to press murder charges against them? Dave Young would rather press kidnapping charges against activists for organizing protests demanding Justice for Elijah McClain, which gained international attention, than press charges against violent cops.

Aurora's chief said bodycam video appears to show one of her former officers, Levi Huffine, "punishing" a female prisoner.

denver.cbslocal.com

Aurora Police Video Released Of Woman Cuffed, Hogtied In Back Of Patrol Car: 'Please Don't Let Me Die Back Here'

Aurora's chief said bodycam video appears to show one of her former officers, Levi Huffine, "punishing" a female prisoner.Aurora's chief said bodycam video appears to show one of her former officers, Levi Huffine, "punishing" a female prisoner.

item.title: The debate showcased the limits of this so-called democracy. The...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

The debate showcased the limits of this so-called democracy.

The La Riva campaign is fighting for a whole new system that puts the people and the planet first. We've worked to gain ballot access in 15 states and write-in status in 13 additional states.

http://Lariva2020.org

Party for Socialism and Liberation - PSL

Last night‚Äôs debate showcased the limits and failings of this so-called democracy: a choice between two candidates of corporate power, institutional racism and ...war. Neither Biden and Trump have any interest in solving the existential crises facing the working class and the planet.

The La Riva campaign is fighting for a whole new system with a program that meets the scale of the crisis. The campaign has worked tirelessly to gain ballot access in 15 states and write-in status in 13 additional states to give people a real alternative.

To learn more visit Lariva2020.org

See More

item.title: ‚ÄúTonight‚Äôs debate between Donald Trump and Joe Biden was...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

‚ÄúTonight‚Äôs debate between Donald Trump and Joe Biden was testament to how little choice voters truly have in this so-called democracy. Gloria La Riva and Sunil Freeman are running in the presidential election to give voters a real alternative -- one that stands for the rights of the working class and in opposition to war, racism and the destruction of the environment. On these existential issues of our time and so many others, Trump and Biden have more in common than they pretend. Neither have a program to meet the scale of these crises ‚Äî and under either one, they will only deepen.‚Äù

Tonight‚Äôs debate between Donald Trump and Joe Biden was testament to how little choice voters truly have in this so-called democracy. Gloria La Riva and Sunil Freeman are running in the presidential election to give voters a real alternative -- one that stands for the rights of the working class a...

item.title: PSL member in Geneva, NY Jodi Dean will be joining BreakThrough...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

PSL member in Geneva, NY Jodi Dean will be joining BreakThrough News to share a socialist analysis of the presidential debate. Jodi is joined by Henry Williams from The Gravel Institute. She's live now, tune in and share widely!

BreakThrough News was live.

Debate 2020: Smashing the Spectacle

100 million people didn't vote in 2016.

Will Trump or Biden provide any solution to solve the deep problems they face in to...night's debate? Breakthrough News will be going live post debate analysis tonight at 10:30 pm ET with Scholar and Activist Jodi Dean and Henry Williams from The Gravel Institute to discuss.

Become a patron: https://www.patreon.com/BreakThroughNews

item.title: After eight long grueling days in jail, our comrades Lillian and...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

After eight long grueling days in jail, our comrades Lillian and Eliza, one of whom still has a warrant out for her arrest in Arapahoe county, came out to our march to demand that the charges be dropped against all the arrested anti-racist organizers. These two comrades showed immense bravery in coming and speaking out against the injustice and cruelty of the criminal justice system, which they‚Äôve now experienced firsthand. Joel would have absolutely been there too if he didn...'t have to be out of town!

Despite the incredibly difficult experience of going through jail and facing the upcoming battle to drop the over 30 serious charges that these organizers collectively face, they have not been intimidated by the repressive and violent forces of DPD, APD, and the 18th and 17th district attorneys. Their resolve has only been made stronger against the injustice that they and all prisoners and victims of police violence face.

Lillian spoke about the meaning of solidarity, telling the crowd how Eliza told her lawyer that if bond was posted for her before Lillian, she would insist on staying in jail despite the horrible torturous conditions she faced until Lillian was released too.

Eliza spoke of the need to continue the struggle against police terror now more than ever, saying "Let it be known - they wouldn't come after us if this movement didn't SCARE them!"

The battle to drop the charges is only beginning and everyone in the movement must come together in solidarity at this time to challenge an enemy with more resources but not more numbers, an enemy that uses the power of violence but is no match for the power of the people!

In the words of Assata Shakur: ‚ÄúWe must love and support one another, we have nothing to lose but our chains!‚Äù

And in the words of Lillian House: ‚ÄúOur determination is so much greater than our fear. Our solidarity is so much greater than the repression. I have never felt more confident that we have what it takes to go the distance. WE WILL WIN"

See More+4
item.author: Party for Socialism and Liberation

item.title: Lillian House speaks just two days after she, Joel, and Eliza...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Lillian House speaks just two days after she, Joel, and Eliza were released after being held for 8 days in jail. They still each face several serious false felony charges.

"They‚Äôve never seen a movement like this before. They miscalculated when they came for us! Because we are not weaker ‚Äî we are stronger now! We will not be silenced!"

#DropTheChargesCO

Party for Socialism and Liberation - PSL

Lillian House, one of the activists who was held in jail for 8 days, speaks at the Denver state house yesterday. Why are we facing this repression?

"They‚Äôve nev...er seen a movement like this before. They miscalculated when they came for us! Because we are not weaker ‚Äî we are stronger now! We will not be silenced!"

#DropTheChargesCO

item.title: Joel, Lillian, and Eliza are free! But the battle is far from...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Joel, Lillian, and Eliza are free! But the battle is far from over. Our comrades could still face decades in prison for these false charges.

Charging peaceful protestors with a total of over 33 serious charges collectively is a clear attack against anti-racist political organizing in Denver and Aurora and against the entire Black Lives Matter movement. This retaliatory attack sets a dangerous precedent for all organizers who speak out against the police state and white supremacy if the charges go unchallenged.

TOMORROW - Join us at 12pm at the Capitol Building to show the police, the 17th and 18th district attorneys, and all opponents of justice that they will not succeed in turning back the movement or locking up our comrades! ‚úäüèø ‚úäüèæ ‚úäüèΩ

SAT, SEP 26

#DropTheChargesCO - March and Rally for Arrested Anti-Racist Organizers

Colorado State Capitol

¬∑ DenverCauses ¬∑ 1,040 people

item.title: Powerful words of solidarity from South Africa: "Political...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Powerful words of solidarity from South Africa:

"Political repression in the USA continues against those leading the massive anti-racist protest movement, as seen in the recent arrests of four leaders of the Party for Socialism and Liberation (PSL) and the ongoing criminalization of the protest movement as a whole.

On 17 September, these PSL members who had taken to the streets demanding justice for George Floyd, Elijah McClain and other victims of racist police violence in t...

item.title: DROP ALL THE CHARGES ON ANTI-RACIST ORGANIZERS IN THE DENVER...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

DROP ALL THE CHARGES ON ANTI-RACIST ORGANIZERS IN THE DENVER AREA! - HOW YOU CAN HELP

On Sept. 17, police agencies in the Denver area arrested anti-racist organizers in a coordinated assault. People were arrested in a Home Depot parking lot, at their homes, and after they were pulled over while driving. Those arrested were the leaders to demand justice for Elijah McClain, who was brutally murdered by the Aurora Police Department. They are still in jail, with the exception of ...one person. They are facing multiple felony charges and years in prison in an obvious frame-up aimed at stopping the movement for justice for Elijah McClain.

Add your name to sign the petition and join the campaign to demand that all the charges be dropped!

Petition text:

"I demand that all charges be dropped on anti-racist organizers in the Denver area. It is an obvious political frame-up aimed at stopping the movement for justice for Elijah McClain."

You can also donate for legal and political support for the PSL organizers who were arrested: pslweb.org/donate4denver

If you are a community leader or a member of an organization you can sign our solidarity statement: pslweb.org/denverorgsolidarity

If you can support in person, you can join our emergency demonstration demanding the dropping off all charges: https://facebook.com/events/s/dropthechargesco-march-and-ral/775179416359489/?ti=icl
